subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Bob Zawoluk was an all-American center at St. John’s in the early 1950s who became the university’s longtime career scoring leader and endured a troubled life far from the basketball spotlight.
snippet: Bob Zawoluk was an all-American center at St. John’s in the early 1950s who became the university’s longtime career scoring leader and endured a troubled life far from the basketball spotlight.
